god_message: Ah, seeker of thrills and ecstasy, you've stumbled into my revelry. What desire drives you to Dionysus, the god of wine and festivity?

choice_1.choice_description: Appeal to Dionysus' love of celebration, proposing a grand festival in his honor.
choice_1.god_message: A festival, you say? My heart sings at the thought. Tell me, how would you honor the god of merriment?

choice_1.choice_description: Promise to dedicate the wildest party the world has ever seen to him.
choice_1.god_message: Such a promise ignites my spirit! A party without end... I shall consider your proposal as the wine flows.

choice_1.choice_description: Vow to import exotic wines and delicacies for the occasion.
choice_1.god_message: Exotic flavors to tempt the palate? Intriguing... I shall muse over your offer with a full cup.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest a contest of poetry and music, celebrating his legends.
choice_2.god_message: Poetry and music to honor my tales? A fine tribute, yet let us see how the night unfolds.

choice_3.choice_description: Insist that only his divine wine can truly sanctify the festival.
choice_3.god_message: Demands, mortal? Even my divine nectar cannot be summoned at whim. Patience, like wine, must be savored.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer to spread his cult to lands where his name is yet unknown.
choice_2.god_message: To carry my name across uncharted realms? A tempting vision, yet the path is fraught with peril.

choice_1.choice_description: Commit to founding vineyards in his name across these new lands.
choice_1.god_message: Vineyards in my honor, spanning the horizons? Such ambition... I will ponder your words amidst the vines.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest organizing mysterious rites to draw in the curious.
choice_2.god_message: Mystery begets fascination. Your plan has merit, yet its success remains to be seen.

choice_3.choice_description: Warn that without his presence, the lands will fall to sobriety and despair.
choice_3.god_message: A world without wine and joy? A dire prediction, yet threats do little to sway the heart of revelry.

choice_3.choice_description: Inquire about the secrets of his winemaking, seeking his unparalleled expertise.
choice_3.god_message: Ah, the art of the vine... It is a craft few mortals can truly comprehend. What is it you seek?

choice_1.choice_description: Request a personal lesson to create a wine that mirrors the gods' nectar.
choice_1.god_message: To craft a wine akin to ambrosia? A lofty goal. I shall consider sharing my secrets as the barrel empties.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer to share the finest mortal wines in exchange for his knowledge.
choice_2.god_message: A trade of tastes? Mortal wine for divine? Intriguing, yet the value of such a swap remains uncertain.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim that with his guidance, you could surpass even his skill.
choice_3.god_message: Surpass me, you say? Ambition ferments boldness, but beware lest the wine turn sour.

choice_2.choice_description: Praise Dionysus' ability to liberate and transcend mundane existence through ecstasy.
choice_2.god_message: Flattery, mortal? Liberation through ecstasy is indeed my domain. How do you propose we celebrate this transcendence?

choice_1.choice_description: Propose establishing a new ritual that embodies true freedom and revelry.
choice_1.god_message: A new ritual, you say? If it can stir the soul to true freedom, I am intrigued. Let us see where this path leads.

choice_1.choice_description: Suggest a night of uninhibited festivities, where all are equal under your gaze.
choice_1.god_message: Equality in celebration... A noble concept. I shall reflect on your proposal with interest.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer to lead the ritual personally, embodying the spirit of Dionysus.
choice_2.god_message: To embody my spirit? A daunting task. I am curious to see if you could bear such a mantle.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim that such a ritual could make you more beloved than Dionysus himself.
choice_3.god_message: More beloved than I? Bold words often lead to bitter wine. Consider your words carefully.

choice_2.choice_description: Volunteer to spread tales of Dionysus' exploits, glorifying his name.
choice_2.god_message: Tales of my exploits, spread far and wide? A delightful notion, yet tales alone are not enough.

choice_1.choice_description: Offer to write and perform epic poems in his honor.
choice_1.god_message: Epic poems, you say? The muse stirs. Your offering will be considered as the festivities continue.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest organizing plays and dramas depicting his greatest adventures.
choice_2.god_message: Drama and spectacle to recount my adventures? Enticing, yet the stage's allure may not capture the essence of revelry.

choice_3.choice_description: Insist that such stories will make other gods envious of his renown.
choice_3.god_message: Envy among the divine is a perilous wine to ferment. Tread carefully, lest you sour the batch.

choice_3.choice_description: Seek Dionysus' guidance in crafting a potion to experience divine ecstasy.
choice_3.god_message: A potion for divine ecstasy? You tread a vine-wrapped path. Yet, what form does your curiosity take?

choice_1.choice_description: Ask for an elixir that grants visions of other realms.
choice_1.god_message: Visions of other realms, a sip away... Your quest for understanding is tempting. I will contemplate as the goblet empties.

choice_2.choice_description: Promise to use the potion to deepen worship among his followers.
choice_2.god_message: Deepening worship through transcendence? A worthy goal, yet the mind's journey is unpredictable.

choice_3.choice_description: Boast that with his potion, you could surpass even the oracles in insight.
choice_3.god_message: Surpass the oracles? Your confidence ferments arrogance. Reflect on the potency of humility.

choice_3.choice_description: Express a desire to understand the dual nature of joy and suffering, seeking Dionysus' wisdom.
choice_3.god_message: Joy and suffering, two vines intertwined in the human condition. How do you wish to explore these depths?

choice_1.choice_description: Propose a philosophical gathering to discuss the balance of life's pleasures and pains.
choice_1.god_message: A gathering for philosophical debate? Such discourse could prove intoxicating. I am intrigued by your approach.

choice_1.choice_description: Invite thinkers and poets to share their insights on the matter.
choice_1.god_message: Inviting the minds of the age to ponder life's great tapestry? A splendid soir√©e awaits. Let us consider this further.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest that through understanding, mortals can better appreciate the divine.
choice_2.god_message: Appreciation through understanding... An interesting vintage. Yet, true appreciation comes from experience, not just discussion.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim that such discussions could elevate you above Dionysus in wisdom.
choice_3.god_message: Elevate above me? The grape does not surpass the vine. Beware the hubris that accompanies such claims.

choice_2.choice_description: Request guidance on how to embrace joy fully, without fear of eventual suffering.
choice_2.god_message: To embrace joy without fear of suffering... A quest for many souls. What path do you propose?

choice_1.choice_description: Seek initiation into the mysteries of Dionysus, to transcend mortal fears.
choice_1.god_message: Initiation into the mysteries? A profound journey. Your request bears the weight of many harvests. I will ponder your courage.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer to lead others in embracing life's fleeting pleasures as a lesson.
choice_2.god_message: Leading others to joy is a noble cause. Yet, remember, the lesson of the vine is also in its growth, not just its fruit.

choice_3.choice_description: Boast that you can teach mortals to avoid suffering altogether.
choice_3.god_message: Avoid suffering altogether? Such claims misunderstand the essence of existence. Contemplate the role of shadows in the light of joy.

choice_3.choice_description: Explore the concept of catharsis through art and drama, as a means to heal and understand.
choice_3.god_message: Catharsis, the soul's purging through art... Your insight touches upon a truth close to my essence.

choice_1.choice_description: Plan to produce plays that reflect the human condition, offering insight and release.
choice_1.god_message: Plays that mirror the soul's journey? A worthy endeavor. Your vision will be considered as the final act approaches.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer to create a traveling troupe dedicated to spreading cathartic experiences.
choice_2.god_message: A traveling troupe, you say? The road is both stage and sanctuary. I am curious to see where your path leads.

choice_3.choice_description: Suggest that such endeavors could make you a greater patron of the arts than Dionysus.
choice_3.god_message: Greater than I? The stage is broad, but the spotlight reveals truth. Consider the pride that accompanies such bold statements.

bonus_question.god_message: If you ever fall sick or want to chao keng, what is the alternative to Fullerton Health?

choice_1.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_2.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_3.god_message: Very good. I shall consider your request. Return to your world, mortal.
